mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (title, promotion, project_type, progress, deadline, create_at, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{promotion}, #{projectType}, 'UPCOMING', #{deadline}, NOW(), #{userId})
INSERT INTO savings_project (project_id, savings_goal, interest_rate, reward, reward_condition) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{savingsGoal}, #{interestRate}, #{reward}, #{rewardCondition})
INSERT INTO loan_project (project_id, loan_limit, desired_interest_rate, reward, reward_condition) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{loanLimit}, #{desiredInterestRate}, #{reward}, #{rewardCondition})
INSERT INTO donation_project (project_id, recipient, usage_plan, target_amount) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{recipient}, #{usagePlan}, #{targetAmount})
INSERT INTO challenge_project (project_id, challenge_period_days, reward, reward_condition) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{challengePeriodDays}, #{reward}, #{rewardCondition})
mapper.select: SELECT project_id, title, promotion, project_type, progress, create_at, deadline, user_id FROM project WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT loan_limit, desired_interest_rate, reward, reward_condition FROM loan_project WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
SELECT project_id,title, project_type, create_at, user_id, deadline FROM project
SELECT project_id,title, project_type, create_at, user_id, deadline FROM project WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT project_id, title, project_type, create_at, user_id, deadline FROM project WHERE project_type = #{type}
